lyrics:
38 contributorsi love louis cole lyricsverse 1 thundercat
let me say good morning my friend
about last night i dont know how it ended
i cant find my phone and i cant find my shoes
but nothing beats being in a party with you

chorus thundercat
lets do it all again
lets do it again
lets do it all again
lets do it again

postchorus thundercat
its just more fun when you come around
even if i act up
you let me know that im not crazy
crazy
crazy

verse 2 louis cole
yeah i remember you were punching my friends
made an oil spill that makes exxon offended
then you fell asleep on the laundry in my room
and this is why i love to party with you

chorus thundercat
lets do it all again
lets do it again
see thundercat liveget tickets as low as 54you might also likebreak thundercat
lets do it all again
lets do it again

verse 3 thundercat
when youre around you know what to say
you brighten my day
i feel that its crazy
when youre around
when youre around3embed
